name: Philosopher
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Philosopher has not used their ability: the Philosopher either shows a 'no' head shake, or points to a character on their sheet. If they chose a character: If that character is in play, that player becomes drunk. The Philosopher gains that character's ability.

otherNights.description: Once per game at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.
